content: description toss on the teatime cardigan for all the cozy vibes this cardigan features fun stripes using a unique blend of stitches giving it a collegiate look it has a slightly oversized fit with ballon style sleeves there is so many color options to fit your style this pattern is free on my blog 1 the teatime cardigan is available as a kit with lion brand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn you need to make your own cardigan plus a free copy of the pdf digital download of the pattern you can even customize your yarn colors i also have a full video tutorial available on my youtube channel 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-teatime-cardigan-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/3rz7g 3 https //youtu be/wvimf1ac6ga
